release_note: It is now possible to change the color of the overlays And of course we killed some BUGs. We hate BUGs.

Incredible new features: Change the sky automatically with a timelapse effect Add a camera movement effect. It is even more amazing with the 3D effect. And of course we killed some BUGs. We hate BUGs.
We fixed some known bugs. Enjoy the most of the app we are creating new features frequently.

Access to Zoetropic is now free. Users who previously purchased will have access to all features without advertisements length limitation and logo in the final video. New features were added such as: Overlays Audio library 3D effect Parallax with Artificial Intelligence AI
New brand and identity Usability improvements Preparation for great evolution of zoetropic
New Feature to generate GIF Bug fixes
Performance improvement Zoetropic from camera Bug fixes
